food.name: MIXED SALAD
food.description: Lettuce, Cucumber, peeled Tomato, Red Onions, Avocado, sweet Green Pepper, Yellow Pepper, Red Pepper, Olive Oil and Red Wine Vinegar.

food.name: CHICKEN CEASER SALAD
food.description: Chicken breast, mixed Lettuce, Anchovies, Parmesan Cheese Mayonnaise, White Wine Vinegar, Garlic and Olive Oil.

food.name: FALAFEL PITTA SANDWICH
food.description: Moroccan style Chickpea ball baked with Spices. Served on Pitta Bread with diced Cucumbers, Lime Pickles, mixed Lettuce and Tahini Sauce.

food.name: GARLIC PARMESAN POTATO WEDGES
food.description: Potatoes cut into Wedges. Baked with Parmesan Cheese, Garlic and Paprika.

food.name: HONEY GARLIC BBQ MEATBALLS
food.description: Sweet and savory Meatballs in BBQ Sauce, Honey and Green Pepper

food.name: TOMATO CHEESE SANDWICH
food.description: Mayonnaise spread on White or Brown Bread with sliced Tomato and aged Cheddar

food.name: CHICKEN LOLLIPOPS
food.description: Well-seasoned Chicken Lollipops served with Kachumbari.
